title.rendered: The Open Source Technology Improvement Fund is Official

content.rendered:
Hello world!

We have completed filing our legal documents for state and federal recognition of the formation of our organization. We are now a legal corporation officially operating in the state of Illinois. We have also received our IRS EIN and held our first meeting with regard to future fundraising plans. We have also began the process of reaching out to the security projects that we wish to support and are seeking endorsements from world-renowned cryptographers.

Things are beginning to move fast!
